title: tharamaa nee mahima
sahitya:
taramA nI mahima pogaDa tArAdhipAvana

anupallavi

 suranadha sarOjAsana vara lambOdara Adi sura sEvita shrInivAsa tirupatIshvarEsha

caraNam

 shESagiri sadana shrIpati nIvE gAdA nAgabhUSuNunuDu nI mitruDu gAdA nAdhA 
dOSa rahita manasuna bhaktilEni vAraina vESadhArulaku tyAgarAja vinuta sarvEsha
